ud4.1:2.3: jaṅghāvihāraṁ → jaṅghavihāraṁ (pts-vp-pli1, mr) | anuvicaramāno → anuvicaramāno addasā kho (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1); anuvicaramāno addasa (mr) | manuññaṁ → idaṁ padaṁ videsapotthakesu natthi, an9.3:1 [3. Meghiyasutta]
ud4.1:5.2: ekakamhi → ekakamhā (bj, pts-vp-pli1); ekakomhi (sya-all) | tāva, yāva aññopi koci → yāva añño koci (si)
ud4.1:23.2: Anugatā → anuggatā (bj, mr aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pāṭhantaraṁ) | uppilāvā → ubbilāpā (si, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
